getrideDescription.title: What is Get and Ride?
getrideDescription.description: Get and Ride is an online application that provides car rental and rental services with a driver or off key specifically for the Bali area. We provide various types of cars at affordable prices. Immediately submit a business trip, vacation, or private event to us.

getrideDescription.title: Best Service for You
getrideDescription.description: Experience The Thrill of Exploring Bali with Get&Ride Car Rental
getrideDescription.new_car_unit_desc: Explore Bali safely and comfortably in our brand new, exclusive car
getrideDescription.influencer_favorites_desc: Trusted by influencers. Our cars are their go-to choice for exploring Bali
getrideDescription.many_attractive_promos_desc: Enjoy exclusive deals on your dream car for your Bali adventure

testimoni.comment_1: During my stay in Bali, I rented an Alphard 2024 from Get&Ride Car Rental. The service was exceptional, the car was brand new, and the driver was incredibly kind. I found the experience to be incredibly comfortable and enjoyable. If you're looking for a car rental, I highly recommend Get&Ride
testimoni.comment_2: Super comfortable using a car from @getride.id to explore Bali! I love that they provide baby car seats, making the trip so much more relaxing
testimoni.comment_3: We had a fantastic time in the car during our Bali trip. No matter where we went, we always relied on Get&Ride. The Zenix Hybrid was great, especially for the kids, as it had TV entertainment to keep them entertained.
testimoni.comment_4: We rented a Hiace Premio car in Bali with a driver. The all-inclusive package and easy booking process made it hassle-free. The car's spacious interior could comfortably fit 11 people, making it perfect for family vacations. The fully air-conditioned car was affordable, too
testimoni.comment_5: I borrowed a car from @getride.id yesterday; it was great to get a new Zenix with 1000 km so I could test it out. They appear to have brand-new cars. You can go to them if you are going to Bali and want to renting a car!
testimoni.comment_6: When visiting Bali, use @getride.id to rent a car. I bought a new Zenix Hybrid car with 1000 kilometers on it, and it turned out to be really great. It's crazy, the car is totally worth it! The cars are still relatively new. You have to rent here if you go to Bali.
testimoni.comment_7: We rented a hybrid Innova Zenix car from @getride.id. The driving adjustment is pleasant and causes no issues. Because there is a sunroof, selfies are fantastic. I didn't anticipate it to be so great, and it's more affordable and highly recommended!
testimoni.comment_8: Rent a super luxurious Zenyx hybrid at @getride.id. There are two back monitors and a large trunk. Seems like I want to have this car for my self. Thank you Get&Ride!
testimoni.comment_9: We drove a Zenix Hybrid car yesterday in Bali, which was significantly more cost-effective and comfortable. We rented it through @getride.id, and the car was incredibly well-equipped, clean, and comfortable.Thank you very much! Superb airport service. I'll rent a car from here again next time.
testimoni.comment_10: It's really a nice car, Zenix Hybrid so it's super duper economical @getride.id
testimoni.comment_11: This time I deliberately ordered a bigger car, a Veloz and it fits a lot! Basically, if you want to rent a car in Bali, we'll leave it up to @getride.id. Best service as always!
testimoni.comment_12: The car we rented for a week in Bali, the newest Veloz, is clean of course and the car is really cool because it can charge inside! The car is big, and can fit a lot of stuff @getride.id
testimoni.comment_13: For those of you who are in Bali must rent here, I'm renting a new Zenix hybrid, guys! The car is super clean, smells good, it's really spacious and it's new because all still in plastic. And the driver is also super friendly and welcoming. @getride.id
testimoni.comment_14: Renting a car at Get&Ride, the Zenix Hybrid car is super cool, very fuel efficient, and futuristic. It feels more luxurious but the price is affordable. Moreover, it's reliable too, suitable for families who want to vacation in Bali, and you can also rent it with a driver. Going anywhere in Bali becomes much easier!
testimoni.comment_15: The car, the driver, everything from Get&Ride is just the best! If you're going to Bali and unsure where to rent a car, in my opinion, Get&Ride is the best rental service overall.
testimoni.comment_16: The car is really comfortable, the Veloz drives so smoothly, it's awesome! The car is clean, well-maintained, in great condition, and it even has a Flazz card, so getting around is super easy. I highly recommend it for anyone looking to rent a car—just go straight to Get&Ride!
testimoni.comment_17: With Get&Ride, the rates are friendly. That's why I chose Get&Ride—not only is it affordable, but it's also quick, and most importantly, very thorough. Everything is checked thoroughly and professionally. And of course, the cars are new
testimoni.comment_18: It's definitely the best way to get around Bali by renting a car at @getride.id. They have great rates, on-time pickup service, and even offer free pickup and drop-off at Ngurah Rai Airport. Book your ride easily on their getandride.com website or through the Get&Ride app (available on Google Play and the App Store). Plus, new users get a 25,000 discount!
testimoni.comment_19: Excellent service, friendly drivers, and affordable prices with a wide selection of cars (available with or without a driver). Plus, they're always on time and the cars are spotless!
testimoni.comment_20: Cruising around in a Zenix Hybrid from Get&Ride was awesome! The car is spacious, comfortable, and has two monitors behind the front seats. This will definitely be my go-to car choice whenever I'm in Bali.
testimoni.comment_21: I rented a Zenix Hybrid from Get&Ride in Bali, and it was a brand new car! If you're planning a trip with friends or family, I highly recommend renting this car from Get&Ride. It's incredibly fuel-efficient, has a spacious trunk, and even comes with Apple CarPlay. It was a fantastic experience!
testimoni.comment_22: Rent a car from Get&Ride, the facilities are amazing, the cars are comfortable and clean! The service is also super friendly! For those of you planning a vacation to Bali, hurry up and rent a car at Get&Ride!

destinationFavList.name: Tirta Gangga Water Palace in Bali
destinationFavList.description: The name Tirta Gangga itself comes from the word Tirta which means water, and Gangga which means the name of a river in India. The flowing water is also believed to be holy water and can wash away bad energy. You can also feed the Koi fishes around and swim here. Don't forget to pack a change of clothes!

destinationFavList.name: Ulun Danu Batur Temple in Kintamani
destinationFavList.description: Ulun Danu Batur Temple is one of the most iconic spots that offers a beautiful panorama, since it is located above Lake Batur with Mount Batur as a background. The air temperature is also very cool and fresh, which is perfect for you who want to refresh or calm your mind.

destinationFavList.name: Melasti Beach Ungasan
destinationFavList.description: In a list of the best beaches on Bali, Melasti Beach cannot be missing! This beach is much admired by tourists for its beautiful sea views and cleanliness. The waves on this beach are not too big and safe for those of you who want to play in the water or swim.

destinationFavList.name: Kanto Lampo Waterfall, Ubud
destinationFavList.description: Waterfalls are usually found around forests or mountains, uniquely, Kanto Lampo is located near the residential area of Gianyar, Bali. The waterfall does not flow directly into the river, but passes through the rocks which creates a beautiful and cool atmosphere because of the splashing water around it.

carFavList.title: Toyota Veloz
carFavList.description: This Toyota Veloz type has been in great demand before it was launched. The newest design looks cooler and more modern and the capacity can also reach up to 7 passengers! You and your family will definitely be comfortable during the holidays

carFavList.title: Suzuki Ertiga Gx
carFavList.description: The Suzuki Ertiga Gx car type can also be an option for traveling around the island of Bali. Apart from the large passenger capacity, the security features are also pretty good. Your vacation is guaranteed to be safer & calmer!

carFavList.title: Toyota Hiace Premio
carFavList.description: If you want a relaxing, comfortable, and large-capacity vacation, you can immediately choose the Toyota Hiace Premio. The cabin design is spacious, it will reduce the feeling of aches and fatigue during trips around the city.

requirements.list_1: Valid ID card and driving license (KTP & SIM A for Indonesian citizens).

policies.list_1: Car rental duration is 24 hours per day
policies.list_2: Overtime fee is 10% per hour of the rental price.
policies.list_3: Fuel, parking tickets, VIP parking tickets, tolls, and driver fees are not included

pickup_info_details.list_1: After payment is received, show the proof of payment/voucher to the driver
pickup_info_details.list_2: Upon arrival at the airport, staff will be waiting for you at the arrival area
pickup_info_details.list_3: Show your voucher to the driver to confirm the booking.

dailyRules.rules1: The duration of car rental with driver is valid for 12 hours with maximum usage until 23:59 if the rental starts later than 12.00 for domestic tourists/WNI.
dailyRules.rules2: If the renter does not spend up to 12 hours in full, the remaining time cannot be accumulated to the next day.
dailyRules.rules3: Free pick-up, delivery and use of a car within the city for the Zone 0 area. An additional fee will be charged for the Zone 1 & 2 area (outside the city)

sebelum_penjemputan.title: Before Pickup
sebelum_penjemputan.list_1: The renter must share with the rental provider an ID card that matches the renter's booking form.
sebelum_penjemputan.list_2: The renter must pay a deposit of 25% of the rental fee.
sebelum_penjemputan.list_3: The rental provider does not cover airport parking fees, VIP parking tickets, and other similar expenses.
sebelum_penjemputan.list_4: The deposit will be returned at the end of the rental period, no later than 24 hours.
sebelum_penjemputan.list_5: Deposit refunds will be processed via bank transfer.

sebelum_pengambilan.title: Before Rental
sebelum_pengambilan.list_1: Renters must share with the rental provider a valid photo of their driving license (SIM A) as well as their ID card (KTP)
sebelum_pengambilan.list_2:
Renters must pay a deposit of 50% of the total rental cost with a minimum of IDR 300,000 and a maximum of IDR 1,000,000 to the provider before the rental starts.Example:
1. If the total rental fee is IDR 550,000, then the deposit amount that must be paid is IDR 300,000
2. If the total rental fee is IDR 2,500,000, then the deposit amount that must be paid is IDR 1,000,000
sebelum_pengambilan.list_3: The deposit will be refunded when the rental is completed, no later than 1 x 24 hours.
sebelum_pengambilan.list_4: Deposit refunds will be processed via Bank Transfer.

saat_pengambilan.title: During Pick-Up
saat_pengambilan.list_1: Rental providers do not cover airport parking fees, VIP parking tickets, etc.
saat_pengambilan.list_2: Renters are required to check the unit, take videos and photos of the unit as a whole before renting begins.
saat_pengambilan.list_3: Renters (WNI) are required to show a valid KTP and SIM that match the data registered when ordering.
saat_pengambilan.list_4: Renters must be over 17 years old.
saat_pengambilan.list_5: All documents provided must be original, not in the name of another person, and in accordance with the data registered when ordering at Get & Ride.
saat_pengambilan.list_6: The renter must ensure that the rented vehicle is used properly and returned in the same condition as before.

penggunaan.title: Rental Policies Usage
penggunaan.list_1: It is prohibited to bring objects or food that cause a strong smell such as durian/jackfruit, etc. Renters will be fined IDR 500,000 if they do not comply with the rental rules.
penggunaan.list_3: Vehicles are not allowed to be transferred to other parties who are not verified by Get & Ride data. Rental provider has the right to cancel orders unilaterally if the following indications occur.
penggunaan.list_4: Renters are not allowed to carry passengers or suitcases that exceed the capacity of the car rented.
penggunaan.list_5: Renters are responsible for replacement or repair costs if there is loss or damage to car keys, accessories, car tools, head units, tools sets, car seats, accessories, scratches, stains, and other costs arising from the renters.
penggunaan.list_6: Renters are responsible for all parking, traffic, and other fines that occur due to violations of the law during the rental.

penggunaan_with_driver.title: Rental Policies During Car Rental
penggunaan_with_driver.list_1: It is forbidden to bring items or foods that produce a strong odor, such as durian/jackfruit, etc. The renter will be fined Rp 500,000 if this rule is violated.
penggunaan_with_driver.list_2: Smoking inside the car is prohibited.
penggunaan_with_driver.list_3: The renter will be fined if they carry passengers or luggage exceeding the capacity of the rented car.
penggunaan_with_driver.list_4: The car rental duration with a driver is valid for 12 hours per day, with a maximum usage until 22.00 PM WITA, if the rental starts after 10:00 AM WITA for domestic/international tourists.
penggunaan_with_driver.list_5: If the renter does not use the full 12-hour rental duration, the remaining time cannot be carried over to the next day or converted to cash.
penggunaan_with_driver.list_6: Free pickup, drop-off, and use of the car within the city for Zone 0 areas. Additional fees apply for Zone 1&2 areas (out of town).

pengembalian.title: After Rental Policy
pengembalian.list_1: Renters must return the car with the same fuel volume when the car was received (bar to bar).
pengembalian.list_2: The rental provider will check the entire car after the rental is complete. If a scratch is found caused by the renter while using the car, a fine of IDR 300,000/point will be imposed.
pengembalian.list_3: If there is an electronic traffic ticket during the rental period, the rental provider will return the deposit by deducting the amount of the electronic ticket fine.
pengembalian.list_4: Get & Ride is not responsible for accidents, losses, and treatment resulting from the accident.
pengembalian.list_5: The provider has the right not to return the deposit if the car is damaged or if the renter violates the law during the rental period.
pengembalian.list_6: The provider is not responsible for items left in the car after the renter returns the car to the rental provider.

overtime.title: Overtime
overtime.list_1: An overtime fee will be charged if the rental exceeds 24 hours per day.
overtime.list_2: Renters will be charged a fine of 10% per hour of the rental price with a maximum limit of 3 (three) hours.
overtime.list_3: Overtime exceeding 3 hours, will be charged for one day's rental fee.

overtime_with_driver.title: Overtime
overtime_with_driver.list_1: Usage exceeding 12 hours per day will incur overtime charges.
overtime_with_driver.list_2: The renter will be fined 20% per hour of the rental fee, with a maximum limit of 3 hours.
overtime_with_driver.list_3: Overtime exceeding 3 hours will incur a charge equivalent to one day's rental fee.

asuransi.title: Insurance
asuransi.list_1: In the event of an accident, the renter is required to submit to the provider all documents required by the insurance company, including but not limited to their KTP/passport and driver's license A.
asuransi.list_2: The renter is obliged to bear the costs at his own risk of IDR 350,000 for each accident (per panel),
asuransi.list_3: The renter must bear the Total Lost Risk Fee of IDR 500,000 if the car is lost.
asuransi.list_4: Disputes between the parties will be resolved via deliberation to reach a consensus. If within 30 days the parties have not reached a consensus, the problem will be resolved at the North Jakarta District Court.

refund.title: Refund & Cancellation Policy
refund.list_1: Low Season Refund (50%): Get&Ride is willing to refund 50% of the down payment (DP) or rental fee paid if the cancellation is made during the low season.
refund.list_2: High Season No Cancel No Refund: Get&Ride cannot process refunds for payments made by guests if cancellations are made during the high season (July-August, December-January, School Holidays, and Special Celebrations/Festivals).
refund.list_3: Cancellations made shortly before the pickup time are non-refundable.
refund.list_4: Refunds will be processed within a maximum of 24 hours after the refund process is approved.

reschedule.title: Schedule Changes
reschedule.list_1: Schedule changes must be made at least 24 hours before the rental time by contacting Get and Ride's WhatsApp service at 081262511511.
reschedule.list_2: Schedule changes cannot be made if the rental date falls within the high season dates/holidays.

delay.title: Flight Delay Policy
delay.list_1: Get and Ride provides tolerance on the condition that the renter informs the delay info before boarding the plane.
delay.list_2: Delay without notification, the renter will be subject to an overtime fine of 10% per hour, from the car rental price, per day.
delay.list_3: Our operating hours: 07:00-21:00 WITA. Tolerance for flight delays until 21:00.
delay.list_4: Delivery/return outside operating hours is subject to a fixed fine of IDR 100,000.

akomodasi_sopir.title: Driver Accommodation
akomodasi_sopir.list_1: There will be an additional fee of IDR 150,000/night (including driver's accommodation) if the vehicle and driver are used after 23.59 local time, both in the city and outside the city.

before_and_terms.list1: Price includes airport parking ticket, gasoline, and tolls
before_and_terms.list2: For routes from the airport (domestic flights), the car will wait up to max 60 minutes from the pick-up time and max 90 minutes for (international flights).
before_and_terms.list3: For routes to the airport, the car will wait max 30 minutes from the pick-up time.
before_and_terms.list4: For passengers who provide their valid flight number, Get&Ride tolerates an additional 60 minutes of waiting time if the flight is delayed.
before_and_terms.list5: An overtime fee will be charged at 10% per hour of the sea price if the passenger exceeds the specified maximum time limit.
before_and_terms.list6: If your flight is delayed, please immediately contact the Get&Ride Admin at WA number +62 812-6251-1511 before boarding the plane for further confirmation as before.

booking_payment.title: Booking & Payment
booking_payment.booking_desc: Airport transfer bookings must be made at least 2 days prior to the scheduled flight.
payment_desc: Payments can be made in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) via bank transfer to a BCA or UOB account.
Price includes: Driver, ERP/Toll, Parking, and Fuel.
Price is applicable to all areas within Singapore.
E-ticket: Passengers must provide an E-ticket for the flight.

pricing.title: Pricing & Surcharges
pricing.pricing_desc1: An additional fee of $10 applies on public holidays, including events like the F1 Grand Prix and the Airshow
pricing.pricing_desc2: A midnight surcharge of $15 applies for pick-ups between (23:00- 07:00).
pricing.pricing_desc3: An additional charge of $15 applies for any extra stops or drop-off/pick-up locations within 5 km of the original route during transfer.

faq.title: Why should rent a car with Get and Ride?
faq.content: By renting a car with Get and Ride, you don't have to worry. Everything is easy, fast, and definitely reliable. You can save your time and costs. Apart from that, you can also choose a car for a vacation around the city of Bali according to your needs at the best price.

faq.title: How to rent a car with Get and Ride?
faq.content:
You can rent a car through Get and Ride website or apps. Here are the steps you can follow:

● Register and Login to the platform

● Choose “With Driver” or “Without Driver” service

● Fill location, time, and duration

● Choose your car type. Make sure you read and agree with the Rental Terms & Conditions also the Policy Conditions

● Select car pick-up details.You can take it directly to the rental place or choose to have it delivered to your place

● Make sure you have filled in and uploaded your personal data such as a photo of your ID Card (KTP/Passport/Driver License)

● Double check your order

● Make your payment

faq.title: Do I have to have a driver's license to rent a car at Get and Ride?
faq.content: For car rental at Get and Ride, renter “without driver” is required to have and show an ID card/SIM A for domestic tourists and an International SIM/Passport for non-domestic tourists. Also make sure all documents are original, not on behalf of another person, and are still active.

faq.title: Is there an age limit for renting a car at Get and Ride?
faq.content: Renters must be over 17 years old and must show an Identification Card (KTP)/SIM A or an active International Driver License / Passport.

faq.title: Are there additional fees to be paid when picking up or returning the car?
faq.content: There is no charge for Off Key / Self-Drive service if the pick-up or return is made in the rental garage or in the Kuta or Legian area (free). A cost will be added outside of these areas, ranging from IDR 50,000 to IDR 100,000 depending on the distance. The all-in package (with driver), pick-up, and use of the Zone 0 car (inside the city) are all free (free). There is an additional price for using the Zone 1&2 region (outside the city), with additional fees starting at IDR 75,000 depending on the indicated distance.

faq.title: How do I reschedule / cancel a rental car booking?
faq.content: For reschedule and cancellation requests, you can contact our WhatsApp at +62 81262511511. Make sure you understand the refund and rescheduling provisions that have been informed. If you want to know the rescheduling status of your Car Rental ticket, you can contact our WhatsApp for more detailed information.

faq.title: Is the driver's charge included in the Get and Ride car rental?
faq.content: The rate for renting a car with a driver includes the driver's services as well as the driver's meals.

faq.title: Can I choose my own pickup time while renting a car through Get and Ride?
faq.content: You can schedule the pickup time based on your availability. It is not feasible to set a pickup time earlier than 7 a.m.

faq.title: Why can't get a car rental in some places?
faq.content: If you do not locate the desired location while requesting a car rental, it is possible that the location has not been registered within the range of the Get and Ride service or that the car at that location is not available or has been ordered by other customers at the time of order.

faq.title: Is the driver familiar with Bali's highways and tourist areas?
faq.content: There is no need to be concerned. Get and Ride has a competent and experienced driver.

faq.title: Will the car rental company provide an invoice?
faq.content: We will create an invoice for each car rental order that has received a Down Payment and send it to you through email or WhatsApp in PDF format

faq.title: What sorts of cars are available for lease through Get and Ride?
faq.content: We have Toyota Alphard, Toyota Hiace, Ertiga, Veloz, Innova, Avanza, and many other models available. Further information is available on our website get & ride or through WhatsApp at +62 81262511511.

faq.title: Can I modify the type of car I rent once I book it?
faq.content: If you have previously made a reservation and would like to change the type of car, you must cancel the existing reservation and make a new one for the new car type. For more information, please contact our customer service at +62 81262511511.

faq.title: What exactly is the renting area?
faq.content: The rental area is the maximum distance a car rental can travel. While ordering, there are many rental locations that can be verified in the coverage area. Check to see whether locations are included in the chosen plan and do not incur additional fees, because additional fees will apply if you use a car outside of the area covered by the package.

faq.title: What if I can't reach the driver?
faq.content: If you are unable to contact the driver, please contact our customer service at +62 81262511511.

sub.title: The Get and Ride Privacy Policy governs and/or describes all services that we have made available to you (the "User"). To keep your trust, we will always keep all of the confidential information contained in your personal data because your privacy is very important to us
description: We explain how we collect, use, disclose, process, and secure your personal information and data that we identify ('Personal Data') in this privacy policy.

We will record and retain your personal information and data when you place an order and/or create a personal account on the Get and Ride Site. In general, any data that you supply from time to time will be stored and used for the purpose of providing our products and services to you, including tokenization, accounting, billing, auditing, credit or payment verification, administration and law, bonus points or similar forms, testing, system maintenance and development, customer relations, promotions, and supporting us in providing services to you.

We may also reveal your information to the Get and Ride group of companies. Due of the importance of these privacy rules and other provisions in the use of our site, please read all of the contents of this privacy policy and other provisions on our site carefully in order to protect the security of your personal data.

sub.title: When you use the Site or any of our online services, we will collect all of your personal information and data under the following conditions:
description: We will require you to enter your personal information correctly, clearly, completely, accurately, and not misleadingly, such as your name, email address, phone number, full address, ID card (KTP), SIM, passport, order details (such as car type, length of order, date of purchase, pick-up and pick-up location), and other information that can identify Users. As well as any information that we require to conduct transactions on the Site and other online services that we offer so that you can take use of the services you require. We are not liable for any losses caused by incorrect, unclear, complete, accurate, or misleading information or data that you give.

We will collect information about your computer or other media you use, such as your IP address, operating system, browser used, URLs, pages, geographic areas, access times, and other computer usage data ('IP Details').

We may use your personal data and other information gathered for Social Media marketing purposes utilizing direct and open graphic approaches, as well as for traditional digital marketing objectives, such as automatically sending you newsletters or push notifications, including but not limited to via email, WhatsApp, and social media (such as YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Tiktok, and others) to notify you of new product information, special offers, promotions, and so on.
We can use and provide the information you provide while using our services to third parties who collaborate with us as long as it is for the benefit of transactions and the usage of our services.

We can use all of the information that we collect to defend ourselves against all claims and relevant law linked to the use of services and violations that you commit on our site for all of the provisions as indicated in the Get and Ride terms of service and recommendations for using our products and services, including and not limited to if required by Court order in the legal process.

You are solely responsible for the confidentiality of your information and personal data, including any access and usage of websites that use your passwords and accounts and tokens, whether with or without your consent. Any unlawful usage that occurs without your knowledge or consent is entirely your responsibility, and we are not liable for any losses that occur as a result of your negligence.
You must promptly alert us of any unauthorized use of your password or account, as well as any breach or threat of breach of security on this website.
You have the option to change or delete the address data that you provided and that we have saved in our system by contacting our Customer Service.

privacy_policy.title: Data Access, Modification, and Removal

If you cannot agree to our privacy rules in whole or in part, you may not visit this site or use the services we offer.
privacy_policy.sub_title2: If you have any problems or need more information regarding your order, please contact us at +62 81262511511 or admin@getandride.com.

s&k.title: General
description: You confirm that you have read, comprehend, agree to, and are bound by the terms and conditions for using Get and Ride by using and accessing the Get and Ride website and its application. You are not permitted to access the website or use our services if you do not agree to abide by and be bound by these terms. Please note that in order to use this site, you must be at least eighteen (18) years old.

The following are the terms and conditions for using Get and Ride:
(i) General terms and conditions that apply to any access to and use of the site's services.
(ii) Particular terms and conditions that further define how certain products and services may be used.

The terms and conditions for using Get and Ride may be modified, added to, removed, or otherwise changed (a "change") at any time as determined by the needs of the site's development and applicable laws and regulations. It is recommended that you frequently check our website to learn about these changes.

You must turn on your mobile device's geolocation capability in order to use some Services in the Application. This geolocation activation is required for the use of services connected to directions, routes, and locations by using maps available in the app, including detecting your location and allowing us to provide service features at your present location ("Current Location"). We reserve the right to accept, postpone, or reject your request for the Service in our sole and absolute discretion.

s&k.title: Utilize
description: You may use the products and services accessible on this Site for personal and non-commercial purposes, subject to the Terms and Conditions of Use in effect at Get and Ride at the time.

When you register with the Application, we gather and process your personal information, including your name, address, email address, and phone number. In order for us to continue offering you the full range of services, you must give correct, current, and updated information. Moreover, you must consent to give us any identity proof that we may lawfully request.

We own the items, technology, and processes contained or contained on the site or application. Except for the uses permitted by the Get and Ride terms and conditions. You do not own or receive anything from us, and we do not grant you any additional rights to this site or application or any of its data, information, or content.

You have committed to refraining from downloading, displaying, transmitting, or otherwise making public any content that does not follow the guidelines set forth in Get and Ride's terms and conditions of use.

Without Get and Ride's previous written approval, you are not permitted to link, screen capture, or crawl data to the site or application. These actions are regarded as a breach of the intellectual property rights of Get and Ride.

s&k.title: Service
description: Get and Ride delivers and arranges an integrated online ordering system and facilities ('Services'), which can service the auto transportation rental you desire, as well as make bookings and purchases and pay online and securely through various accessible payment systems and facilities.
Except for repairs, upgrades, or maintenance on our site, our Services are normally available online twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week.

Without our express permission, you are not permitted to resell our goods, utilize, copy, monitor, display, download, or duplicate any material or information, software, or services available on our applications or sites for any commercial activities or purposes.

You can place valid orders and purchases using the programs, websites, and services that are offered. Orders and purchases cannot be made for speculative, fraudulent, or illegal purposes. We retain the right to cancel your order or purchase if it turns out to be invalid, as we may find out or have reason to suspect.

You also ensure that the data and information you supply to us, whether while ordering/ordering or registering at Get and Ride, are accurate, current, and complete. Please refer to the Data Use Policy for the conditions of use of the data and information you give.

The Confirmation Letter contains just information for the name specified on the Confirmation Letter. You are solely accountable for any information that is disseminated as a result of your negligence and/or intent to cause harm to yourself or others.

s&k.title: Booking
description: Product orders/purchases are regarded successful or finished after you have made payment and Get and Ride issues and sends you an order/purchase confirmation letter. If there is a disagreement or a difficulty, the data provided in Get and Ride will be the primary reference and will be considered valid.
By completing an order/purchase, you consent to receive an email from us immediately after placing an order/purchase with information about the products you ordered.
According to the terms and regulations, some Goods require a reservation in advance. You alone are accountable for upholding such agreements.

s&k.title: Cost
description: Get and Ride constantly aims to deliver services at the best possible price that you can buy, therefore you should double-check and understand the particular terms and circumstances that apply to a price before placing an order. You should also review and understand the cancellation and refund policies that apply to certain Goods and/or Prices.
Taxes, levies, fees, and other things that we shall mention on our website are included in the prices listed.
On occasion, we might provide discounts and/or promotions. Please be advised that specific terms and conditions could be necessary, such as those relating to order and refund policies.
Get and Ride reserves the right to adjust a product's pricing at any time without prior notice, but products you have purchased and for which you have received a Confirmation Letter will not change.

s&k.title: Payment
description: Payment of the buying price is a requirement for making a purchase. We accept credit card payments (VISA, Master Card, and BCA Card), Virtual Account transfers, transfers between accounts and between banks to Get and Ride bank accounts, and other payment methods as specified on the Site.

We use 'Secure Socket Layer (SSL)' technology to protect and encrypt your payment card information. For you to obtain further treatment in accordance with applicable procedures and laws, you must report any instances of credit card fraud or misuse of the payment system to us and your credit card issuing company / bank right away.
You must carefully follow the payment instructions we provide. Here's what happened with your payment:
(i)  by including both our account number and the Virtual Account number on every order you place; and/or

(ii) a mistake in processing the nominal payment for your order results in the transfer of your money to a virtual account or account that does not follow the payment instructions we provide, or it results in the debiting of a nominal amount from your bank account that does not follow the payment instructions we provide, which results in You understand and accept that if your order is not verified, we are under no obligation to issue a refund to you due to any errors or carelessness on your part that resulted from failing to adhere to the payment instructions we have provided, making the loss entirely your responsibility. Also, the payment error indicated above cannot be accepted as a valid payment for your order; therefore, in order to receive confirmation of your order, you must make a payment in accordance with the payment instructions we have supplied.

For each order that we can validate, we will send you a confirmation letter through email with a description of the goods, the order you placed, and payment confirmation. The details in the confirmation letter we provide you must be printed out and kept on file by you. This confirmation letter is a crucial document, so make sure you have a printout on hand whenever you use or pick-up the item you ordered. We refuse to deliver items or services if you cannot demonstrate that you have lawfully placed an order and paid for it, and that you have released Get and Ride from all duties and losses in any form.

s&k.title: Changes and Cancellations
description: Get and Ride will consider that you have read, understood, and agreed to the cancellation policies and conditions if you place an order. Every confirmation letter we provide to you includes information about our cancellation procedures and terms. Please keep in mind that certain tariffs or offers are not refundable or changeable. You are responsible for reviewing and understanding the cancellation policies and conditions ahead of time.

If you want to review, amend, or cancel your order, please contact our customer service by email or phone. Please keep in mind that additional fees for cancellation may apply depending on the cancellation policies and conditions.
The procedures for submitting changes and canceling orders are outlined in the Confirmation Letter or other media that we may update from time to time.
If you cancel your order, we will provide a refund under the following conditions:

• Refunds are given in the amount and time specified by the policies and cancellation requirements that are in effect.
 • According to the applicable policies, the amount of monies returned to you cannot be more than the nominal amount you paid to us. 
 • Refunds are sent to the car renter's account that has been registered on your order for transactions that were paid for using Klikpay BCA using a BCA Card.

You acknowledge and agree that We may only process cancellation requests in accordance with the applicable cancellation terms and conditions, Grab & Ride Terms and Conditions of Use, e-Refund Terms and Conditions, and other terms and conditions that apply to Our Site. For this reason, you agree to hold us harmless from any losses you might incur as a result of your cancellation request or your failure to adhere to the relevant cancellation terms and conditions, Get and Ride terms and conditions, e-Refund terms and conditions, and other rules that apply to our website.

s&k.title: Security
description: When you access your data information and place orders on our site, we use Secure Server Layer (SSL) access, which encrypts the data information that you submit through this site.

We will do our best to assure its safety. We cannot guarantee the encryption's strength. You are required to make sure that the device(s) used to access Get and Ride are fully under your control and that we won't be held liable for any issues that arise as a result of unauthorized access to the information you give. As a result, by utilizing the equipment or devices you are using to access Get and Ride, you release us from any losses that occur or may occur as a result of your carelessness.
Because your account is entirely your responsibility, you should always change the confidentiality of your password on a regular basis.

s&k.title: Data Usage
description: We value your privacy and take it seriously.

We will record and retain your personal information and data when you make a booking with Get and Ride. We store your personal information and data in order to provide you with products and services. We will save any data that you give from time to time for accounting, auditing, credit card verification, security, points or all types of forms, promotion, development, and to enable us deliver services to you in the future.

We reserve the right to disclose your personal information and data to group companies and their affiliates (groups of companies), partner partners, government authorities, and competent legal practitioners in any country.

s&k.title: Overtime
description: An additional overtime fee will be charged if the rental duration exceeds 12 hours of use or after 23.59 local time per day of rental
Renters will be fined 10% per hour of the rental price, with a maximum limit of 4 (four) hours
Overtime that exceeds 4 hours, will be charged one-day rental fee

s&k.title: Driver Accommodation
description: An additional fee of IDR 150,000/night (including driver's lodging) will be charged if the use of the vehicle and driver exceeds 23.59 local time, both within and outside the city.

company_profile.about_company_description: Get & Ride is an online transportation which can be access through website and application (App Store & Playstore) that provides experienced car rental services in Bali. We also offer the best transportation solutions for tourists and businesses with a selection of high-quality cars at affordable prices. To enhance the comfort of our users, we are also planning to expand our services to other major cities besides Bali. Trust your holiday vacation, business trip or private event to us.
company_profile.vision_description: To became a leading car rental company in Bali that provides the best service, offering easy access, and affordable transportation solutions for traveller.

mission_description.first: Providing car rental services in other major cities with the same level of service and quality as in Bali.
mission_description.second: Implementing innovative and user-friendly technology, booking, and payment systems.
mission_description.third: Collaborating with business partners and related industries to expand reach and meet customer needs.

company_profile.easy_access_description: Get&Ride provides easy access order through website and application, so you can book anytime & anywhere. Choose your preferred schedule and car type effortessly and reliably with us.
company_profile.high_quality_description: Get&Ride offers cars with the highest quality and maintained cleanliness. All cars are regulary serviced for your comfort.
company_profile.best_service_description: Providing professional drivers, implementation of health protocols, and vehicle protection. All cars are guaranteed with insurance coverage.
company_profile.car_rental_with_driver_description: Get&Ride provides easy access order through website and application, so you can book anytime & anywhere. Choose your preferred schedule and car type effortessly and reliably with us.
company_profile.car_rental_airport_transfer_description: Enjoy the convenience of traveling to/from the airport at the best prices only with Get&Ride! Going to/from the hotel to the airport becomes easier with Get&Ride’s Airport Transfer feature.
company_profile.self_drive_description: Get&Ride offers cars with the highest quality and maintained cleanliness. All cars are regulary serviced for your comfort.

influencer_testimoni: Yesterday, I rented a car with @getride.id, it was really good to get a Zenix that was only 1000 km so I could try the car too. I think all of their cars are brand new. For those who want to try car rental in Bali, you can go to them!

Rent a car with @getride.id when I went to Bali. Got a Zenix Hybrid car that was only 1000 km and it was really good. The car is really worth it, it's crazy! The car is still new. If you go to Bali, you must rent here.

We rented a hybrid innova zenix car at @getride.id. Taking turns driving was good and no problem. Because there is a sunroof so if a selfie is super good. I didn't expect it to feel so good and feel more efficient and super recommended!
After renting zenyx hybrid at @getride.id Super luxurious. The trunk is very spacious and there are 2 rear monitors. So it feels like I really want to have this. Thank you Get&Ride!

Yesterday in Bali, we used Zenix Hybrid car which was much more economical and more relaxing. We rented it from @getride.id, the car is very complete, super clean and comfortable. Thank you very much! Super nice service delivered to the airport. Next time rent a car here again anyway.
